businessProfile.name: Sheldons Street Pizza
businessProfile.address: 3767 S Baldwin Rd, Lake Orion, MI 48359, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 3767 S Baldwin Rd, Lake Orion, MI 48359, USA

reviews.text: My husband and I were in the area for our anniversary and decided to try something new. Found this as a highly rated restaurant online so decided to try it. It FAR exceeded our expectations and the staff was incredible and went above and beyond ehat I have ever seen at a restaurant. I'm assuming I spoke to the owner who was so amazingly kind and the other person working gave amazing suggestions as well.  I have never met such incredible people while at a pizza place. They seemed to know everyone that entered by name in my short time waiting. It was so neat to witness that kind of community. Once we got our food I realized the reviews don't even do it justice. We got 2 different types of pizza and some breadsticks and oh my word.... Best pizza we have ever tasted 100%! The crust was absolutely amazing and the breadsticks tasted so good, especially with the garlic cream cheese dip and fresh taste. To top it off we were blessed to try the yummy dessert and would definitely splurge on it in the future. Super rich but so tasty!! If you're in the mood for pizza don't try anywhere else... this place will become your favorite!!!

Yummy üòã Hands down, the dough is fantastic. The cheese and toppings taste fresh and their ratios are spot on. It really felt like it was made with love. New go to üôå The owner and two team members working were personable and attentive too, which was really nice because it was my first time visiting. Thank you to the Sheldon team üôè

Fresh, hot, and packed with flavor, Sheldon‚Äôs Street Pizza totally hit the spot. The thin crust is a perfect NY-style throwback I‚Äôve been craving, and the breadsticks are fluffy carb heaven. You can really taste the quality in everything. Highly recommend!

First time visit.  Ordered a simple small pizza with pepperoni, ham and green peppers.  Excellent pizza.  Nice buttery crust, perfect amount of sauce and the toppings tasted really fresh.  Counter man was super pleasant, and building looked clean.  Will definitely order from here again.

The best pizza in the Orion area.

Sheldon's has been the pizza joint since it was in the Orion Keg and Wine and I'm happy to say they are still as good if not better than ever.

The order was ready a few moments faster than even predicted and was piping hot.

The service in the store and on the phone was excellent as always.

The atmosphere is great, the store is clean, and they are organized.

We had a pizza and a Calzone and both were excellent.

We will continue to order and recommend Sheldon's to all.

Highest recommendation.

recentReviews.text: Omg! I just had the best experience at this restaurant. My boyfriend and I came from out of town and found this place online. When we came in my boyfriend (who name is Sheldon) asked where Sheldon was. The owner Sheldon in a funny way said ‚Äúyou don‚Äôt want to meet that guy‚Äù. We all laughed and knew we had just met Sheldon. We loved that he tried to trick us haha!  The owner Sheldon helped us decide what to order. He personally told the workers in the back he would make our order. We had a deli sandwich and it was amazing! We ended up eating it before we left the restaurant. We ordered 2 small pizzas, one which he told us he would upgrade to a large and wouldn‚Äôt charge us. We were amazed at how kind Sheldon was.  My boyfriend Sheldon goes ‚ÄúI am coming back here!‚Äù The owner Sheldon and my Sheldon took a picture together too. It was like we had been knowing each other for a while and had just met. Great experiences from all around. Great food, great service, great environment, great personality! I hope whoever reads this review doesn‚Äôt think twice about coming here. Please trust me on this, try Sheldon‚Äôs Street Pizza!!! Hands down, the best!

I stopped in yesterday for the first time because I was in the area, and read the good reviews.
I was greeted my the owner, and mentioned it was my first time there. He made sure that I felt welcome, and was very kind. We got the family deal. It came with bread, salad, and pizza.
The pizza was Detroit style, and tasted just as such. It was so good!
We chose the Greek salad, and it was fresh and yummy. The Greek dressing was homemade and was honestly my favorite part.
We got the pepperoni bread and it was also delicious.
We were very pleased with the overall experience & price point will be back.

I drove by and decided to give this place a try. Met the owner, who is great. He suggested the Detroit style and it was outstanding. Definitely some of the best. I've had. Highly recommend stopping in to check this place out. The owner clearly runs a great establishment and is making some outstanding pizza.

One of my favorite pizza places! The owner is super nice and has some good taste. His favorite 2 toppings are what I always get! haha, pepperoni and banana peppers üòã I live in Lapeer, so whenever I am out this way I go to Sheldon's!
Had fantastic customer service and the food was super fresh and delicious!! Definitely recommend!

Yummy üòã Hands down, the dough is fantastic. The cheese and toppings taste fresh and their ratios are spot on. It really felt like it was made with love. New go to üôå The owner and two team members working were personable and attentive too, which was really nice because it was my first time visiting. Thank you to the Sheldon team üôè

Came in for my first visit to get pizza & breadsticks. The oven was having issues that day & our pizza wasn‚Äôt cooked well, was a bit doughy in some spots. That was disappointing. I have had Sheldon‚Äôs food one other time, my work had sandwiches catered & they were pretty good.

First time visit.  Ordered a simple small pizza with pepperoni, ham and green peppers.  Excellent pizza.  Nice buttery crust, perfect amount of sauce and the toppings tasted really fresh.  Counter man was super pleasant, and building looked clean.  Will definitely order from here again.

detailedReviews.author: Marlene Korff
detailedReviews.text: Pizza take out , very good

detailedReviews.author: Nika Thomas
detailedReviews.text: Omg! I just had the best experience at this restaurant. My boyfriend and I came from out of town and found this place online. When we came in my boyfriend (who name is Sheldon) asked where Sheldon was. The owner Sheldon in a funny way said ‚Äúyou don‚Äôt want to meet that guy‚Äù. We all laughed and knew we had just met Sheldon. We loved that he tried to trick us haha!  The owner Sheldon helped us decide what to order. He personally told the workers in the back he would make our order. We had a deli sandwich and it was amazing! We ended up eating it before we left the restaurant. We ordered 2 small pizzas, one which he told us he would upgrade to a large and wouldn‚Äôt charge us. We were amazed at how kind Sheldon was.  My boyfriend Sheldon goes ‚ÄúI am coming back here!‚Äù The owner Sheldon and my Sheldon took a picture together too. It was like we had been knowing each other for a while and had just met. Great experiences from all around. Great food, great service, great environment, great personality! I hope whoever reads this review doesn‚Äôt think twice about coming here. Please trust me on this, try Sheldon‚Äôs Street Pizza!!! Hands down, the best!

detailedReviews.author: Jen Ski
detailedReviews.text:
I stopped in yesterday for the first time because I was in the area, and read the good reviews.
I was greeted my the owner, and mentioned it was my first time there. He made sure that I felt welcome, and was very kind. We got the family deal. It came with bread, salad, and pizza.
The pizza was Detroit style, and tasted just as such. It was so good!
We chose the Greek salad, and it was fresh and yummy. The Greek dressing was homemade and was honestly my favorite part.
We got the pepperoni bread and it was also delicious.
We were very pleased with the overall experience & price point will be back.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Moy
detailedReviews.text: I drove by and decided to give this place a try. Met the owner, who is great. He suggested the Detroit style and it was outstanding. Definitely some of the best. I've had. Highly recommend stopping in to check this place out. The owner clearly runs a great establishment and is making some outstanding pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Erik Miller
detailedReviews.text: One of my favorite pizza places! The owner is super nice and has some good taste. His favorite 2 toppings are what I always get! haha, pepperoni and banana peppers üòã I live in Lapeer, so whenever I am out this way I go to Sheldon's!

detailedReviews.author: Charly Schwalm
detailedReviews.text: Had fantastic customer service and the food was super fresh and delicious!! Definitely recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Chelsea Rager
detailedReviews.text: Yummy üòã Hands down, the dough is fantastic. The cheese and toppings taste fresh and their ratios are spot on. It really felt like it was made with love. New go to üôå The owner and two team members working were personable and attentive too, which was really nice because it was my first time visiting. Thank you to the Sheldon team üôè

detailedReviews.author: Kay Dom
detailedReviews.text: Came in for my first visit to get pizza & breadsticks. The oven was having issues that day & our pizza wasn‚Äôt cooked well, was a bit doughy in some spots. That was disappointing. I have had Sheldon‚Äôs food one other time, my work had sandwiches catered & they were pretty good.

detailedReviews.author: John DiPonio
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!!!   Always done right.

detailedReviews.author: Craig Stevenson
detailedReviews.text: First time visit.  Ordered a simple small pizza with pepperoni, ham and green peppers.  Excellent pizza.  Nice buttery crust, perfect amount of sauce and the toppings tasted really fresh.  Counter man was super pleasant, and building looked clean.  Will definitely order from here again.

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Newman
detailedReviews.text: Check this place out!   Genuinely impressed.  Italian Calzone was phenomenal.  Place extremely clean and friendly staff  üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü

detailedReviews.author: Jayden Salman
detailedReviews.text: Great service, great food, great place. A pizza place doesn‚Äôt get any better than Sheldon‚Äôs Street Pizza. So many options to choose from, and you can never make a wrong choice because all of their food is so good. The people that helped me were fantastic! I‚Äôd recommend this place for any sort of event. All guests are guaranteed to love it and it‚Äôs a safe option.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Mullen
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I were in the area for our anniversary and decided to try something new. Found this as a highly rated restaurant online so decided to try it. It FAR exceeded our expectations and the staff was incredible and went above and beyond ehat I have ever seen at a restaurant. I'm assuming I spoke to the owner who was so amazingly kind and the other person working gave amazing suggestions as well.  I have never met such incredible people while at a pizza place. They seemed to know everyone that entered by name in my short time waiting. It was so neat to witness that kind of community. Once we got our food I realized the reviews don't even do it justice. We got 2 different types of pizza and some breadsticks and oh my word.... Best pizza we have ever tasted 100%! The crust was absolutely amazing and the breadsticks tasted so good, especially with the garlic cream cheese dip and fresh taste. To top it off we were blessed to try the yummy dessert and would definitely splurge on it in the future. Super rich but so tasty!! If you're in the mood for pizza don't try anywhere else... this place will become your favorite!!!

detailedReviews.author: N S
detailedReviews.text: We love Sheldons! Our favorite pizza place. They also make fresh delicious salads, bread sticks, and wings that we love.

detailedReviews.author: Kat
detailedReviews.text: best pizza i‚Äôve ever had! got the spinach pie pizza and it was too good!

detailedReviews.author: Kimberly Beasley
detailedReviews.text: I usually get my favorite Greek salad here bc it's so fresh and the dressing is to die for but got a box of fries last night...OMG!! Highly recommend.   Crispy on the outside and soft and flavorful on the inside.   U can't find these just anywhere! Always delicious treats like cookies for the sweet tooth!! ‚ù§Ô∏èüçüü•ó

detailedReviews.author: Mike Ashley
detailedReviews.text: Excellent quality and delicious- family owned and run.  You can tell they are passionate about their products!  Solid deep dish too.

detailedReviews.author: Austin Hunter
detailedReviews.text: Amazing service and food. Perfect thin crust pizza. Very Kind staff and owner I give them all the business I can and you should too.

detailedReviews.author: Cortney Leigh
detailedReviews.text: Fresh, hot, and packed with flavor, Sheldon‚Äôs Street Pizza totally hit the spot. The thin crust is a perfect NY-style throwback I‚Äôve been craving, and the breadsticks are fluffy carb heaven. You can really taste the quality in everything. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: KnowOneGood
detailedReviews.text: Super friendly and accommodating staff.

detailedReviews.author: Travis D
detailedReviews.text: Awesome üëè pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: Ammar Arshad
detailedReviews.text: Best wings I‚Äôve ever had especially the honey siracha sauce nothing beats it! The owner is super nice the staff is friendly it‚Äôs family owned business and everything is great! 100 percent you should go

detailedReviews.author: Erica Jones-Rose
detailedReviews.text:
Easily one of the best pizza experiences I‚Äôve had in a long time. Met the owner, who couldn‚Äôt have been nicer ‚Äî super friendly, clearly passionate, and proud of the food he‚Äôs serving. He even offered to make any style of pizza, which just shows the level of care and confidence in his product.

We started by ordering a calzone to split and try ‚Äî and it was so good, we ate it in the car and immediately turned around and ordered a pizza. No hesitation. The crust on the pizza was unreal ‚Äî perfectly pillowy and crispy at the same time ‚Äî and every bite made it clear they‚Äôre using high-quality ingredients.

We demolished the entire pizza in the car, too. Couldn‚Äôt even wait to get home. That really says it all. Can‚Äôt wait to come back.

detailedReviews.author: Heather Chapel
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent service AND the pizza is delish‚Ä¶ not greasy! I just tried it for the first time and is worth it!
We are getting so sick of greasy Jets pizza - Sheldons dough is yummy! I don‚Äôt usually eat the crust, but I do eat their crust. And their mini breadsticks are worth a try!

detailedReviews.author: Michele Millar
detailedReviews.text: First time trying Sheldon‚Äôs. Best pizza I have had in the area

detailedReviews.author: Haley Watson
detailedReviews.text: Man, this pizza is unmatched!!! My only complaint is that I wish there was one in Macomb County, closer to me :) Sheldon is almost always there when I come in and is always so personable and friendly! 10/10 would recommend

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Williams
detailedReviews.text: Great employees amazing food

detailedReviews.author: Mike Birch
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza and delicious fresh salads.

detailedReviews.author: james
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza  in town.forgot my wallet  and sheldon gave me a pizza on credit couldnt be better people

detailedReviews.author: Subi Dr
detailedReviews.text: Outstanding pizza every time! Best pizza spot around white lake/commerce!

detailedReviews.author: Mahaila Bastedo
detailedReviews.text: Always fresh and delicious the staff members are fantastic and know most customers by name. I love coming here especially for the calzones!

detailedReviews.author: madison snyder
detailedReviews.text: The pizza and pepper jack cheese bread were top notch! Customer service also great!

detailedReviews.author: Rae Fernald
detailedReviews.text:
The wings are absolutely to die for, they‚Äôre hand breaded, and not frozen bag chicken. The buffalo is what we usually get and the spice is 4/10, so good if you can‚Äôt handle a lot of spice.

The handtossed pizza is excellent quality, you really get what you pay for here. Best pizza place around.

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Huddleston
detailedReviews.text: Italian roll was phenomenal.

detailedReviews.author: Trina Ewing
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I are from St. Louis, MO. We just came from the lake Orion location. We came near closing time and Sheldon greeted us with open arms, great service, and the best pizza I‚Äôve had in Michigan. We will definitely be back.

detailedReviews.author: Austin Fall
detailedReviews.text: By far the best pizza and cheese bread around!!!

detailedReviews.author: Frank S
detailedReviews.text:
Don‚Äôt often leave reviews but this place deserves one. First, their garlic knots are phenomenal, especially with the garlic cream cheese sauce. Haven‚Äôt had a bad pizza from there either. Always delicious, hot and extremely fresh.

Finally and perhaps the most important is their service. You can tell it‚Äôs family owned and operated as everyone is extremely curious and friendly. They welcome you with smiles and ensure you‚Äôre completely satisfied.

detailedReviews.author: D CARR
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around, I don't even consider other places anymore üçï

detailedReviews.author: Evan Koppes
detailedReviews.text: I put in an order in the wrong location and they took care of me.  Really great food and great people

detailedReviews.author: Bill Wrubel
detailedReviews.text: Great food at a fair price

detailedReviews.author: Melissa G
detailedReviews.text: OMG!!! This is the Best pizza!!! My family was getting tired of the same old places and we decided to give Sheldon's a try. Best decision!! Pizza was hot, made perfectly, and the taste made my taste buds jump for joy! This our new pizza place! The staff was exceptional; polite, professional, and great at the art of pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Mourray
detailedReviews.text: Sheldon‚Äôs Street Pizza is in my opinion the best pizza in and round the Detroit Metro area. The owner is on point and their 95% of the time give them a try. You will not be disappointed. Uncle Joe.

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Moss
detailedReviews.text: Staff was very friendly and welcoming as soon as we came in. They accidentally made a calzone with onions, and remade it unprompted and gave us the second one for free. The ingredients and food were excellent. We will be back to the Commerce location VERY soon.

detailedReviews.author: Eli Toby
detailedReviews.text: Came in and was instantly greeted by the owner who had a big smile and was very welcoming. Recommended us some of the chicken and let me tell you the chicken tenders and fries were some of the best i‚Äôve ever had. The cajun fries had perfect seasoning and had a good crisp as well as the tenders were crispy and so tender. The sheldon‚Äôs sauce that came with it was amazing and overall every thing was great. Looking to come back very soon and would recommend people to try this spot. Very excited to try their pizza next.

detailedReviews.author: David Barylski
detailedReviews.text: Great owner, high quality ingredients with amazing flavors

detailedReviews.author: RM Agresta (Bob)
detailedReviews.text:
Ever just NEED a pizza to round off a great day? That's what happened on Wednesday, and Sheldon's came through for us.

Two gret pizzas in less than 30 minutes and delivered to my car because he saw me drive up. This guy is awesome, and his pies are even better.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Clark
detailedReviews.text:
Amazing cauliflower and gluten free crust!!!
Highest quality ingredients (have NEVER had an allergic reaction) Sheldon and staff are wonderful!

detailedReviews.author: Tom Pierce
detailedReviews.text: Would not give me the first thing on menu at price advertised and

detailedReviews.author: Meek Garrison
detailedReviews.text: This pizza is just perfect! Dough is chewy and airy, the sauce is delish and our favorite cup pepperoni plentiful! Very good service too.

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Sanchez
detailedReviews.text:
The best pizza in the Orion area.

Sheldon's has been the pizza joint since it was in the Orion Keg and Wine and I'm happy to say they are still as good if not better than ever.

The order was ready a few moments faster than even predicted and was piping hot.

The service in the store and on the phone was excellent as always.

The atmosphere is great, the store is clean, and they are organized.

We had a pizza and a Calzone and both were excellent.

We will continue to order and recommend Sheldon's to all.

Highest recommendation.

detailedReviews.author: Cheryl McClellan
detailedReviews.text: I just purchased my first time at Sheldon's Street Pizza and was extremely happy. I got a calzone and it was delicious, stuffed with lots of ingredients.The staff were very friendly and made my calzone with special instructions. I will definitely be back to try other items on their menu!

detailedReviews.author: Wyatt
detailedReviews.text: The food was amazing and the staff was super nice

detailedReviews.author: Jacob Christiansen
detailedReviews.text: By far my favorite spot for pizza! The staff is always welcoming, the store is clean, and the food is incredible. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Hodge
detailedReviews.text: Great. Every time.

detailedReviews.author: Stacy Pawlovich
detailedReviews.text: Omg!!!!!! My family is ADDICTED to Sheldon‚Äôs Pizza. The flavors - honestly - never had real pizza until I tried Sheldon‚Äôs. Their general manager, Andrew, he‚Äôs awesome! We came in late, they were slammed, and he made us chicken to apologize for my 15-min wait and the chicken was also AMAZING!!!

detailedReviews.author: Ryan Bugni
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food, clean restaurant,  and staff was ridiculously nice, even when super busy! They came out to check on us multiple times while waiting/and eating. Highly recommended üëå

detailedReviews.author: Ed Thomson
detailedReviews.text: Love Sheldon and his team.   Food is always top notch.

detailedReviews.author: Cristero
detailedReviews.text: Amazing fresh pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Dajos
detailedReviews.text: This is great food. Don't just think pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Sandy Evans
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, so fresh and tasty.  Love love love the BLT pizza!!  This is a must if you haven't tried their menu.

detailedReviews.author: Ky The Shark
detailedReviews.text: Just moved to the area and was looking for a good pizza place to regular. Drove by this place and decided to try a calzone and it was really good. Decided to do the bbq chicken pizza a week later and I took one bite and had to write this review lol. It is AMAZING. The guys working in there were really friendly too. I definitely found my regular spot!

detailedReviews.author: Jan Piacentini
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and subs

detailedReviews.author: Nolan Rhodes
detailedReviews.text: BEST PIZZA PLACE IN TOWN. The owner is very friendly and involved with the customers. The pizza is always phenomenal, thank you Sheldon

detailedReviews.author: Nina T
detailedReviews.text: I was a customer of Sheldon's when he worked elsewhere, and was so happy when he opened his own pizzaria! The ingredients are so obviously fresh each time we order. He seems to really care about his customers. Prices, location, service....all excellent!

detailedReviews.author: Kim Jones
detailedReviews.text: Fabulous pizza and cheese bread. Super friendly staff. Very personal service.

detailedReviews.author: Aubrey Peplinski
detailedReviews.text: I travel an hour for these sandwiches. The smokey deli wrap is my favorite! The customer service is always nice and they treat you like family!

detailedReviews.author: Janae Meacham
detailedReviews.text: The first thing I noticed and loved was the customer service! The gentleman on the phone was kind & helpful. I order how he suggested and man am I glad ‚ò∫Ô∏è did! Excellent pizza and a few weeks ago we had the calzone also delicious. And I'm a very picky pizza person! Can't wait to try something else! Real & Good quality ingredients too! Do yourself a favor and give it a try. You won't regret it! üòÅ‚ò∫Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Tim Peplinski (Tim)
detailedReviews.text: Excellent sandwiches. Workers always polite

detailedReviews.author: James Peake
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around. Local, tasty, customizable. Sheldon is da bomb. He's friendly and funny.

detailedReviews.author: Dino Filias
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in the city and possibly in the state. Sheldon has great wings, salads and bread too!

detailedReviews.author: Maryam Seleem
detailedReviews.text: I love Sheldon‚Äôs street pizza they have the best pizza it‚Äôs always so fresh! The restaurant is always nice and clean and the staff is the best! Especially the lady at the front she is so nice and answers every question I have! Love this place! Recommend it to everyone!

detailedReviews.author: Brandon TheFateful
detailedReviews.text: Oh, Sheldon's Street Pizza is hands down the best pizza joint in town! üçïüôå The crust is perfectly crispy, the sauce is flavorful, and the toppings are always fresh. Plus, the staff is super friendly and the prices are reasonable. It's definitely my go-to spot for a delicious slice! üòãüçï

detailedReviews.author: Darin Hakeem
detailedReviews.text: By far best pizza out there. Such welcoming employees. I was struggling on what to order and the girl in the front went above and beyond helping. Everyone there was so nice and treated me like family. I would definitely recommend this place  to everyone and will me coming back!!

detailedReviews.author: Noah Lukas
detailedReviews.text: I have zero idea how this place has such a high rating. I ordered the medium honey Sriracha chicken pizza and they gave me a pizza that tasted like cardboard and it was almost exclusively made of cheese! They were extremely light on the toppings and even on the honey Sriracha sauce! And the total was $20.17! I had to force it down my throat because I was working and didn't have time to stop anywhere else. Unbelievable. These people are scammers, do not get pizza from here. You're better off getting a hot and ready from Little Caesars right by it.

detailedReviews.author: Cheryl Butkiewicz
detailedReviews.text: Sheldon‚Äôs is the absolute best pizza and customer service in town!! Lots of food in addition to pizza! Love Sheldon‚Äôs catering menu too!!

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Ramaut
detailedReviews.text: Everything I‚Äôve had so far has been high quality. The salads are always fresh. The specialty pizzas are the best. BBQ chicken and the cheeseburger pizza are my favorites. Sheldon makes the best pizza in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Katie Bullock
detailedReviews.text: Sheldon and all his staff are amazing and so friendly also their food is great too!

detailedReviews.author: Debbie Polley
detailedReviews.text: Our experience is alway great.

detailedReviews.author: Jeanmarie S
detailedReviews.text: Sheldon‚Äôs is the very best!!!! The friendliest people and the most delicious pizza and deli wraps and salad. Consistently amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Koppes
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around hands-down. I really like the people that run this place. The quality of food is excellent. I highly recommend their classic pepperoni pizza and their antipasto salad.

detailedReviews.author: Susie Stec
detailedReviews.text: It's the best pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Steven Paquette
detailedReviews.text: Top notch food, great people.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the owner and staff for their exceptional friendliness and personalized service, creating a welcoming and community-oriented atmosphere. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The pizza, particularly the Detroit-style and thin crust options, receives high accolades for its outstanding taste and quality, with fresh ingredients and perfect crusts being frequently highlighted. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility

The restaurant's diverse menu, including fresh salads, delicious breadsticks, and unique offerings like the spinach pie pizza, delights customers and keeps them coming back for more. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Inconsistent food quality, such as undercooked pizza and lack of toppings - review management can address this concern
Pricing discrepancies or perceived value issues - social media marketing can improve this area
Negative reviews and reputation issues, such as being called "scammers" - review management can address this concern

positive.author: Nika Thomas
positive.text: Omg! I just had the best experience at this restaurant. My boyfriend and I came from out of town and found this place online. When we came in my boyfriend (who name is Sheldon) asked where Sheldon was. The owner Sheldon in a funny way said ‚Äúyou don‚Äôt want to meet that guy‚Äù. We all laughed and knew we had just met Sheldon. We loved that he tried to trick us haha!  The owner Sheldon helped us decide what to order. He personally told the workers in the back he would make our order. We had a deli sandwich and it was amazing! We ended up eating it before we left the restaurant. We ordered 2 small pizzas, one which he told us he would upgrade to a large and wouldn‚Äôt charge us. We were amazed at how kind Sheldon was.  My boyfriend Sheldon goes ‚ÄúI am coming back here!‚Äù The owner Sheldon and my Sheldon took a picture together too. It was like we had been knowing each other for a while and had just met. Great experiences from all around. Great food, great service, great environment, great personality! I hope whoever reads this review doesn‚Äôt think twice about coming here. Please trust me on this, try Sheldon‚Äôs Street Pizza!!! Hands down, the best!

positive.author: Jen Ski
positive.text:
I stopped in yesterday for the first time because I was in the area, and read the good reviews.
I was greeted my the owner, and mentioned it was my first time there. He made sure that I felt welcome, and was very kind. We got the family deal. It came with bread, salad, and pizza.
The pizza was Detroit style, and tasted just as such. It was so good!
We chose the Greek salad, and it was fresh and yummy. The Greek dressing was homemade and was honestly my favorite part.
We got the pepperoni bread and it was also delicious.
We were very pleased with the overall experience & price point will be back.

negative.author: Tom Pierce
negative.text: Would not give me the first thing on menu at price advertised and
